Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.model.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Media<java.lang.String>, java.io.Serializable

    public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements Media<java.lang.String>, java.io.Serializable
    Class for Image type Media. Uses a String which refers to the resource name.

    1.0, 29/10/13
